description:
fmt: remove "Scan:" prefix from error messages
The prefix was not uniformly applied and is probably better left off anyway.

Fixes issue 4944.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2f6ebc31b696 ***

fmt: remove "Scan:" prefix from error messages
The prefix was not uniformly applied and is probably better left off anyway.

Fixes issue 4944.

R=golang-dev, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/12140043

subject: code review 12140043: fmt: remove "Scan:" prefix from error messages
